title: About Me
text:
Hello, my name is Gideon Ondap.
I am a second-year Government and Politics PhD student at University of Maryland, College Park. My current research lies in linked fate, race and ethnic politics, and political behavior. More specifically, I explore the attitudes underlying linked fate and its relation to other political attitudes and voting.
I received my B.A. in Political Science from California Polytechnic State University Pomona in 2024. I am a proud product of the California Community College system.
You can reach me at ondap@umd.edu.
